scripts.clean: rm -fr dist && mkdir -p dist/es5/packages dist/esm/packages dist/es6/packages
scripts.build-es6: BABEL_ENV=es6 babel src --out-dir dist/es6 --source-maps && BABEL_ENV=es6 babel packages --out-dir dist/es6/packages --source-maps
scripts.build-esm: BABEL_ENV=esm babel src --out-dir dist/esm --source-maps && BABEL_ENV=esm babel packages --out-dir dist/esm/packages --source-maps
scripts.build-es5: BABEL_ENV=es5 babel src --out-dir dist/es5 --source-maps && BABEL_ENV=es5 babel packages --out-dir dist/packages --source-maps
scripts.build-size: (echo "source size" ; find src/ -name '*.js' | xargs cat | wc -c) && (echo "dist esm size" ; find dist/esm -name '*.js' | xargs cat | wc -c) && (echo "dist/es6 size" ; find dist/es6 -name '*.js' | xargs cat | wc -c)
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-es6 && npm run build-esm && npm run build-es5 && npm run build-size
scripts.cover: NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter html --reporter cobertura --reporter=lcov npm run test-cover
scripts.lint: eslint src test && npm run lint-yarn
scripts.lint-yarn: !(grep -q unpm.u yarn.lock) || (echo 'Please rebuild yarn.lock file using public npmrc' && false)
scripts.publish-prod: npm run build && npm run test-fast && npm publish
scripts.publish-beta: npm run build && npm run test-fast && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test-node && npm run test-dist
scripts.test-cover: NODE_ENV=test tape -r babel-register test/node.js && nyc report
scripts.test-dist: npm run build-es6 && node test/start.js test-dist
scripts.test-shader: npm run build-dist && budo src/test/fp64-shader.spec.js:build/test-bundle.js --dir test --live --open --watch-glob '**/*.{html,css,scss,js,glsl}' -- -t babelify -t brfs-babel
